text: (Tyasapachi) unaka jatika mukhiya ra abhimani manisaharule bhannathaleh ki he su'aiba! Hami timila'i ra juna manisaharu timro sathama imana lya'eka chan unala'i aphno nagarabata nikalidine chaum yadi timiharule hamro dharmala'i svikara garenau bhane. So'aibale bhane ma timro dharmama jana ghrna gardachu bhane tapani
